title: Lack of quorum adjournment of Senate session
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 15 (APP):Lack of quorum on Wednesday led to adjournment of Senate session till Friday morning.
PML-N Senator Nasir Mehmood Butt was speaking in the Senate when PTI senator Saifullah Abro pointed out the quorum.
Deputy Chairman Senate Syedaal Khan ordered to run bills and made counting. However, the house was not in order which resulted adjournment of session till Friday 10:30 am morning.
